model.units

Class EntityImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.units.LevelElementImpl
      • model.units.DynamicLevelElement
        • model.units.EntityImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Entity, LevelElement
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    EnemyImpl, HeroImpl

    public class EntityImpl
extends DynamicLevelElement
implements Entity
    This class represent the entity that is the foundation of every entity in the game.
